name: albrightlabs/sitemaprobotshumans-plugin
description: Automatically generates sitemap.xml, robots.txt, and humans.txt files. Compatible with RainLab.Pages and OFFLINE.Boxes.

suggest.rainlab/pages-plugin: Adds support for including static pages in the sitemap
suggest.offline/oc-boxes-plugin: Adds support for including visual page builder pages in the sitemap
